short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wishlist Anything.. From Any Site.. Instantly. Share with friends and family anywhere, anytime.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Karchy allows you to quickly "WishList" any item, on any website, instantly. No more need for multiple wish lists on multiple sites that can't be shared with friends, Or explaining to someone how to copy&paste a URL and send you emails that get lost!
